str2: At one time or other, at some time, formerly. From the base of pou and te; indefinite adverb, at some time, ever.
Unprofitable, useless, detrimental. Inefficient, i.e. detrimental.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A prolonged form of nun for emphasis; just now.
Useful, serviceable, very profitable. From eu and chrestos; easily used, i.e. Useful.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
